title: [Large-Scale] Strategies for Building Caring Relationships in Online Science Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using online learning tools and foundational elementary science education concepts
context.additional_context: A course for in-service elementary teachers to master methods of strengthening caregiving relationships with learners while conducting science classes in smartphone-centric constrained technical environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four elements of Noddings’ care theory (caring attitude, modeling, practiced care, and confirmatory response) to online science classes.
Learners can explain methods for designing learner-centered care environments and providing feedback using VR simulations.
Learners can implement care strategies reflecting individual learners’ emotional and academic needs during project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
